mcq.statement: Why does cytosine not form a bond with adenine?

options.a: Cytosine is unable to form hydrogen bonds with adenine.
options.b: Adenine and cytosine have incompatible hydrogen bond donors and acceptors.
options.c: Cytosine only pairs with thymine due to their complementary structures.
options.d: Adenine is a pyrimidine and cannot bond with cytosine.
